nodes.text: The Way of the Force was a roleplaying-game adventure in year four of the Living Force campaign. It was a the second adventure in the Jedi Code trilogy and was written by Ron Heintz and edited by Margaret Heintz and Jae Walker.

The heroes are hired by Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk to help him prepare for the upcoming Jedi Trials at the Almas Academy. However, it soon becomes clear that someone is manipulating the events they encounter.
